meanings.sent1: She enjoys twirling around in circles.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina was twirling gracefully on stage.
meanings.sent3: The little girl kept twirling until she got dizzy.
meanings.sent4: The wind twirling the leaves in the air resembled a dance.
meanings.sent5: The colorful umbrella was twirling in the wind like a pinwheel.

meanings.sent1: The twirling of the top fascinated the children.
meanings.sent2: The twirling of the tornado caused destruction in its path.
meanings.sent3: The twirling of the fan created a cool breeze in the room.
meanings.sent4: The twirling of the planets around the sun is a marvel of nature.
meanings.sent5: The twirling of the carousel brought joy to the children at the fair.
